author: daxian-dbw
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------
```
$s = Get-ChildItem -Force C:\pagefile.sys
$s.Mode
```

Expected behavior
-----------------
'-a-hs-'

Actual behavior
---------------
returns `null`

Environment data
----------------

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSEdition                      Core
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.16-20-g56dddcd42944024bafa04f57d108c6760c5d09ae-dirty
```

The `Mode` property is a `CodeProperty` added by powershell and the method `[Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.FileSystemProvider]::Mode(PSObject)` will be called when accessing `Mode`. In this case, an exception will be thrown from `InternalSymbolicLinkLinkCodeMethods.IsReparsePoint(fileInfo)` within that method.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: It was fixed in CoreFX for Windows but still doesn't work on WSL.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: On WSL 7.0 Preview1 still returns "Access to the file '/mnt/c/pagefile.sys' is denied.

title: "dir -force -hidden c:\pagefile.sys | % Mode" returns null while it should be '-a-hs-'
